subject: Fwd: Order #SSN4545
description_text:
Hi,

I sent this email to service@simsonn.com but it might have been the wrong
address, can you please assist with the below:

cancel the order and reconfigure my basket before ordering again. Can you
please help me with this?

Thank you,
- Bogdan
